history.proof: intros. unfold doGenericServer in H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cvfsi: candidates_vote_for_selves_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (ps ps' : list packet) (p : packet) (t : term) (v : bool), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ms) -> (forall p0 : packet, In p0 ps' -> In p0 ps \/ In p0 (send_packets h ms)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps' -> In p ps

Premises:
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : Net.name) (ps : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) => map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), Net.name -> list (Net.name * Net.msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
term = nat : Set
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base
do_leader_rvr : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (p : packet) (t : term) (ps ps' : list packet), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> (forall p0 : packet, In p0 ps' -> In p0 ps \/ In p0 (send_packets h ms)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t true -> In p ps' -> In p ps
handleAppendEntriesReply_rvr : forall (h : name) (s : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (ps ps' : list packet) (p : packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (tae : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool) (t : term) (v : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply h s src tae es res = (d, l) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' ps' \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p ps'
handleTimeout_rvr : forall (h : name) (net : network) (ps : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (p : packet) (t : term) (v : bool), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p (nwPackets net)
handleClientRequest_rvr : forall (h : name) (net : network) (ps : list packet) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (p : packet) (t : term) (v : bool), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p (nwPackets net)
handleAppendEntries_rvr : forall (h : name) (h' : Net.name) (s : raft_data) (ps ps' : list packet) (p : packet) (d : raft_data) (r : msg) (tae : term) (li : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (lc : logIndex) (t : term) (v : bool), handleAppendEntries h s tae li pli plt es lc = (d, r) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' ps' \/ p' = {| pSrc := h; pDst := h'; pBody := r |}) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p ps'
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RRIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (gd : ghost_data) (d d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
RRIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (gd : ghost_data) (d d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l

RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

unfold doGenericServer in H.
unfold doGenericServer in H.
destruct (applyEntries h st (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied st <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex st)) (findGtIndex (log st) (lastApplied st)))).
inversion H.
rewrite H in H0.
destruct (lastApplied r <? commitIndex r) eqn:Heq.
- inversion H0; clear H0; subst.
  unfold applyEntries in H.
  inversion H.
  left; apply Heq.
- discriminate.

destruct (lastApplied r <? commitIndex r) eqn:Heq.

  right.

- discriminate.
